ygData.subject: Re: Newsgroup
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a web server on a T1 and if people would like, I can set up a public newsgroup on it for us.  Would work with any news brower, which most people have
ygData.messageBody:
I have a web server on a T1 and if people would like, I can set up a public
newsgroup on it for us. Would work with any news brower, which most people
have included in their mail program nowdays. I like this idea better than
email or web boards. You would just set up my server as another news server
on your client, and as I'm not using it for anything else right now, this
would be the only newsgroup on it. Let me know what you think.

-Shadowwalker of Karana


----- Original Message -----
From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
To: Wizard List <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 9:02 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Newsgroup


> From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
>
>
> Hey, can anyone turn this very popular list into a newsgroup? I will
> still keep reading, but it would be much more comfortable to do it in
> newsgroup format.
>
> --
> Qenelin
> --
>
> Nemo me impune lacessit!
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Looking for a new hobby? Want to make a new friend?
> http://www.ONElist.com
> Come join one of the 115,000 e-mail communities at ONElist!
